snippet.title: [Tricky Tracks 👣] DevLog #007 - Preparing for STEAM NEXT FEST
snippet.description:
#indiegame  #hideandseek #devlog 

Welcome to the 7. dev-log for Tricky Tracks! This video is about us focusing on the Steam Next Fest in June 2023. We are and have been working very hard to polish and improve our Demo for this event. We also take a look what comes after this: Tricky Tracks then will be released into Early Access and we look forward to work even more on our game with all of you =)

Play Tricky Tracks via Steam: 
►https://store.steampowered.com/app/2122000/Tricky_Tracks__Early_Access/

Development on Twitch:
► Rain: https://www.twitch.tv/rain_crafts
► Jan: https://www.twitch.tv/lightyarn

Join us on Discord and help us develop the game further: 
► https://discord.gg/uFc7hYufng

Follow us here to stay tuned: 
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tricky_Tracks
► Website: https://playtrickytracks.com/
► IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/tricky-tracks
► Trello: https://trello.com/b/uaChruEq/trickytracks

00:00 Intro
01:32 Focusing on STEAM NEXT
02:24 What is our DEMO about?
03:44 We want to have crossplay
06:09 Early Access release after STEAM NEXT!
